item.title: Directive 8020 Interview with Supermassive Games
item.description:
This week on Gamertag Radio, Danny Peña and Riana Manuel-Peña talks about more hands-on impressions of games from Summer Game Fest 2025 and an interview with Supermassive Games about Directive 8020.

Watch the award-winning film, Gamertag Radio: A Podcast Story now for free on Youtube - story.gamertagradio.com | Store: store.gamertagradio.com. Send us questions - fanmail@gamertagradio.com | Speakpipe.com/gamertagradio or 786-273-7GTR. Join our Discord - https://discord... Feed: https://audioboom.com/channels/4949308.rss

item.title: Health Warning: The Human Cost of Climate Inaction with Julia Gillard
item.description:
Scientists warn that the world could breach its 1.5°C emissions limit within just 2-3 years. It’s a scary thought, but across the globe, many are grappling with an even more immediate and visceral reality: the climate crisis is already a health crisis.


From deadly heatwaves to worsening air pollution and climate-related trauma, the health impacts of climate change are escalating... Feed: https://feeds.acast.com/public/shows/6781112bec40818e0b501b6a
